channel.title: How to make it so you cant trade in wilderness?
channel.description:
I need to know how to make it so that you cant trade in wilderness, becasue some people are useing the trade glitch in wildy when you die in my server
I am useing MTPV2 Sourced [PI] as my server source. PLEASE HELP :)

item.title: How to make it so you cant trade in wilderness?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Abandoned Dreams, post:4, topic:377168”][quote author=Arcane Mage link=topic=473078.msg3459623#msg3459623 date=1294358222]
you might be partly right, but im sure that “wilderness” is actually called “wildy” in the code listing
[/quote]if IsInWildy c.playerTrade = false[/quote]

Are you crazy? thats not going to work. after an ‘if’ statement a ‘(’ must follow through it

Eg:

if isInWIldy c.playerTrade = false

^^ no.

if(isInWildy() && c.playerTrade = true) { sM("You Cannot trade in the wilderness!"); return false; }

^^ yes, even though that probably won’t work.

@OP: I’ll give you the code for delta, and maybe you can try to convert it because I don’t progam PI.

if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)) { sM("Nice try; No trading in wilderness idiots."); return false; }

^^ I dont think that would work for delta either, im not sure.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it so you cant trade in wilderness?

item.title: How to make it so you cant trade in wilderness?

item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“Arcane Mage, post:1, topic:377168”]I need to know how to make it so that you cant trade in wilderness, becasue some people are useing the trade glitch in wildy when you die in my server

I am useing MTPV2 Sourced [PI] as my server source. PLEASE HELP :)[/quote]Okay, I Am Ganna Get Flamed By Better Coders Because There Mostly Fags But… IDK About The Real Code But Heres My Idea To TRY To Help, Sorry If Wrong.

ifWilderness c.playerTrade = false

Again JUST A Idea To TRY And Help You Please Don’t Flame.
